summary: It\'s animation only. One the way to see it in game - change original mt_idle.hkx.
descriptionHtml:
I\'m stop support this thread.
All my dance anims (if they will) you\'ll find at Umpa\'s [url=\"http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2658\"][b]Dance Animation Modder Resource[/b][/url]

It\'s animation only. One the way to see it in game - change original mt_idle.hkx.
PS.
It\'s manual work, not motion capture.
author: Rsv
